chunk_text:
/**
 * @file Phaser game configuration
 * @description Core game settings for Phaser engine configuration:
 * Physics: Arcade physics system with gravity
 * Display: Canvas dimensions and renderer
 * Scenes: Game state management and flow
 * Debug: Development tools and visualization
 * @module GameConfig
 */

metadata.notes: Main game configuration object with rendering, display, physics, and scene settings
